title: Hydro Sense

title: HeartStrings
description: AI-based journaling app to analyze user emotions, track mood in a calendar, and recommend music. Designed and built for Berkeley AI Hacks 2024.

description: Built a data board using Python to analyze and forecast unemployment rates during the pandemic.

title: CollegeConnect
description: Centralized application tracking system with a built-in database for high school applicants to track their applications.

description: Explored automated hyperparameter tuning techniques to improve model accuracy, reduce overfitting, and streamline training time.

title: Healthy Food Comparison
description: Built a nutritional comparison tool to analyze grocery items and surface balanced, cost-effective meal choices.

title: Top 50 Songs on Spotify
description: Analyzed Spotify Top 50 tracks using audio features (danceability, tempo, valence) to uncover trends and listener behavior.

title: Vegetation Management Worker Hour Analysis
description: Studied work-hour allocation for vegetation management crews to improve labor planning and wildfire-mitigation efficiency.

title: Harry Potter Character Analysis
description: Applied text mining to extract character networks and sentiment shifts across the series.

title: Python Number Guesser
description: Interactive guessing game challenging users to find a random number using logical feedback and hints.
